author: Eric Berger
title: Astronaut about to escape from Earth into space: “Good luck to everyone”
description: “We are healthy, we've been tested very well with the medical teams.”
content:
Enlarge/ At the Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center in Star City, Russia, Expedition 63 crewmembers Chris Cassidy of NASA (left) and Anatoly Ivanishin (center) and Ivan Vagner (right) of Roscosmos pose for pictures March 11.
